Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Retrocd4 (cyclic dimeric KR-12, synthetic AMPs, UCBB1; Derivative: retro-ld*)
Sequence Information.Source: designed, human cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (67.57%) tocd4K: 13%, R: 19%, I: 13%, G: 19%.Activity:  active against E. coli (MIC 1.25 uM), P. aeruginosa (MIC 0.625 uM), S. aureus (MIC 1.25  uM), and C. albicans (MIC 2.5  uM). Warning: Non-standard assay.SAR: the linear form of this peptide has activity similar to the cyclic form.
Literature Information.Author: Gunasekera S, Muhammad T, Strömstedt AA, Rosengren KJ, Göransson U.2020
Literature Information.Title: Backbone Cyclization and Dimerization of LL-37-Derived Peptides Enhance Antimicrobial Activity and Proteolytic Stability.
